page.title: 15WHAT WE THINK ABOUT LUDWORTH
page.content:
Emma and I went round the doors to ask People if they liked Living in Ludworth and most people we asked said,"Yes we do like living in Ludworth." We asked questions about these things:- 1.Housing 2.Shops 3.Bus services 4.Medical services 5.Libraries 6.Community facilities
Almost everyone we asked was satisfied with the standard of things on the list, but some people were not pleased with the distance the had to travel to the doctor's, dentist, or library. We did the survey at night, because more people were at home.
